meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>torso</kanji> <kanji>body</kanji> is the body area that's your torso. It's your <vocabulary>body</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>trunk</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>torso</vocabulary>, depending on what kind of body you have.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
